mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
insert into sys_user_feedback ( id, userid, content, pics, create_date, del_flag ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pics,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
